# GLMMcosinor ShinyApp project 

## Description
This project is a Shiny R application for the GLMMcosinor R package

## Installation
To run this app, you need to have R and Shiny installed. You can install the required packages by running:

## Installation

You can install the development version of GLMMcosinor from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("RWParsons/GLMMcosinor")

# install version 0.1.0.9000
renv::install("https://github.com/RWParsons/GLMMcosinor")
```
